LightningComponentBundle.description: A Lightning Web Component that lists, deletes, and uploads files to an Amazon Web Services S3 bucket.

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Card Title
property.description: The title to be used at the top of the card.

property.name: hideIcon
property.label: Hide the AWS logo icon
property.description: Hide the AWS logo on the Lightning card.

property.name: prefix
property.label: Demo Prefix
property.description: A string that will uniquely identify your demo environment in the shared S3 bucket, such as 'Veterans Administration Demo on Tuesday'.

property.name: awsRegion
property.label: AWS Region
property.description: The AWS region in which the S3 bucket is located.

property.name: linkExpirationSecs
property.label: Link Expiration (seconds)
property.description: The number of seconds after which the links in the table will expire (defaults to 24 hours).
